plot: Deeply affected by what was taken from him years ago, Jacob's potential was never fully realized. Now content with a meager existence, he is challenged by a life he thought was beyond his reach.
title: Finding Jacob
plot_es: Deeply affected by what was taken from him years ago, Jacob's potential was never fully realized. Now content with a meager existence, he is challenged by a life he thought was beyond his reach.
plot_en: Deeply affected by what was taken from him years ago, Jacob's potential was never fully realized. Now content with a meager existence, he is challenged by a life he thought was beyond his reach.
